roleset.name: wander
roleset.note: STRAY-V NOTES: Horrid, horrid stylistics in that sentence. Someone actually got paidfor that? (from stray.01-v)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: It is compromises such as this that convince Washington's liberals that if they simply stay the course, this administration will stray from its own course on this and other issues.
example.arg: if they simply stay the course
